Title: All counterrevolutionary elements must be thoroughly, completely, absolutely, totally eliminated to protect socialist construction!
Publisher: Chaohua meishu chubanshe (朝花美术出版社) Beijing
Notes: The worker is holding a book titled "Materials about the Hu Feng Counter-Revolutionary Group" (關於胡風反革命集团的材料), published in millions of copies during the campaign against Hu Feng.
